subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Preakness Stakes
Rachel Alexandra (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: The 3-year-old super filly, who ran past the Kentucky Oaks field last Friday at Churchill Downs, was purchased by a partnership led by Jess Jackson.
snippet: The 3-year-old super filly, who ran past the Kentucky Oaks field last Friday at Churchill Downs, was purchased by a partnership led by Jess Jackson.
